description: This file defines the application configuration for an Angular project, setting up routing, zone change detection, and client hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Enables zone change detection with event coalescing.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Provides routing configuration to the application.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client hydration with event replay functionality.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay for client hydration.
